Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x79186ba0fc6fa49fd9db2f0ba34f36f8c24489c7.sol#522-589):

	- beneficiary.transfer(msg.value.sub(weiAmount)) (/unique_chucks/5/0x79186ba0fc6fa49fd9db2f0ba34f36f8c24489c7.sol#549-550)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensOnHold (/unique_chucks/5/0x79186ba0fc6fa49fd9db2f0ba34f36f8c24489c7.sol#563-565)

	- ballers (/unique_chucks/5/0x79186ba0fc6fa49fd9db2f0ba34f36f8c24489c7.sol#627-630)

Crowdsale.hasEnded (/unique_chucks/5/0x79186ba0fc6fa49fd9db2f0ba34f36f8c24489c7.sol#728-731) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- now > endTime || token.balanceOf(this) == 0 || crowdsaleConcluded

	-crowdsale.buyTokens.value(msg.value)(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/5/0x79186ba0fc6fa49fd9db2f0ba34f36f8c24489c7.sol#356-358)
